node.title: Dyson Black Friday Deals 2021: Save up to 25% on the Airwrap, Hair Dryers, Vacuums and More
node.alt: The Dyson Pure Cool TP01 air purifier.
node.description: Customers can bag a discount of up to $200 on select Dyson devices offered at Best Buy, Walmart and the Dyson website.
node.content:
["Dyson is offering a string of Black Friday deals on select items, including cordless vacuums, hair dryers and other items.", "Customers can save up to $120 as part of the latest Black Friday promotion at the company's website.", "Some Dyson deals are also available as part of Black Friday sales at Walmart and Best Buy (which is offering savings of up to $200 on Dyson products).", "Here, we round up some of the best Dyson Black Friday deals.", "
Dyson hair care devices
", "Customers can get three complimentary accessories with a purchase of Dyson's Airwrap hairstyler, priced at $549.99. The three extra items include the following:", "Buy the Airwrap at the Dyson website here", "", "
The Dyson Airwrap hair styler.
", "Get this special gift edition of the Dyson Supersonic hair dryer (which comes with a Dyson presentation case and Prussian blue and rich copper brush set, exclusively available at the Dyson website) for $429.99.", "The fast-drying hair dryer is designed to protect hair from extreme heat damage, with controlled styling to help increase smoothness by 75 per cent, increase shine by up to 132 per cent and decrease frizz and flyaways by up to 61 per cent, according to the company.", "Buy it at the Dyson website here", "", "
The Dyson supersonic hair dryer.
", "This cordless straightener automatically regulates temperature 100 times per second. Described as \"the only straightener with flexing plates that shape to gather hair,\" the device's added control allows for enhanced styling with less heat, according to Dyson. It is priced at $499.99.", "Buy it at the Dyson website here", "", "
The Dyson Corrale hair straightener.
", "
Vacuums
", "Save $200 on this deep cleaning vacuum, which optimizes suction and run time across all floor types, priced at $599.99 (reduced from $799.99). It comes with a full-sized bin and full-sized cleaner head.", "Buy it at Best Buy here\n", "", "
The Dyson Outsize cordless vacuum.
", "Get $100 off this cordless vacuum, priced at $399.99 (reduced from $499.99). The device is designed to remove \"deep-down dirt,\" while offering 35 minutes of fade-free run time.", "Buy it at the Dyson website here", "", "
The Dyson V8 Animal cordless vacuum.
", "Save $100 on this lightweight vacuum, priced at $299.99 (reduced from $399.99). Built with a soft roller cleaner that's gentle on hard floors, it offers up to 40 minutes of fade-free power.", "Buy it at Walmart here", "", "
The Dyson V8 Fluffy cordless vacuum.
", "Get $50 off this cordless vacuum designed to \"deep clean anywhere\" with up to 60 minutes of run time and three power modes. The device is priced at $499.99 (reduced from $549.99).", "Buy it at the Dyson website here\n", "", "
The Dyson V10 Absolute cordless vacuum.
", "
Air purifiers
", "Save $120 on this multi-functional device, which purifies, humidifies and cools your room, priced at $699.99 (reduced from $819.99). Its \"fully sealed\" filtration system captures gases and particles and projects purified, humidified air throughout the room.", "Buy it at the Dyson website here", "", "
The Dyson Pure Humidify+Cool air purifier.
", "Bag $200 off this purifying fan, priced at $299.99 (reduced from $399.99). It removes 99.97 per cent of pollutants and allergens as small as 0.3 microns, according to Dyson", "Buy it at the Dyson website here", "", "
The Dyson Pure Cool TP01 air purifier.
"]
